help-file.title: INSTRUMENT INSTRUMENTS MUSIC
help-file.content: Instruments are a necessity of a bard and needed to create magical affects. The bard must first be holding the appropriate instrument and then type 'play <songname>'. The various instruments are as follows: flute, harp, horn, drums, lyre, mandolin. Unlike spells, the music played by a bard is continuous when the bard begins playing and will continue until he/she ends the song or begins a new song. Songs do eventually end, of course.
